Kendo UI PivotGrid Frequently Asked Questions

This is a collection of frequently asked questions about what Kendo UI PivotGrid supports.

Q: Does the PivotGrid widget works with OLAP cube delived by MS SSAS?

A: Yes. The MS SSAS uses XMLA protocol, which is the main requirement for the PivotGrid to work.

Q: Does the PivotGrid widget works with different OLAP servers?

A: If the OLAP service implements XMLA standard, then it should work out-of-the-box. Please note that the supported format of Execute method is a Multidimensional property:

<PropertyList>
   <Format>Multidimensional</Format>
</PropertyList>

and value of the Axis format should be TupleFormat:

<PropertyList>
   <AxisFormat>TupleFormat</AxisFormat>
</PropertyList>

Q: I don"t have OLAP cube, can I still use Kendo UI PivotGrid?

A: Currently, the Kendo UI PivotDataSource has limited support for binding to flat data. Note that in this scenario not all of the features avialable when bound to a OLAP cube are supported. Those includes filtering, hierarchies, multiple measures etc.
